description: This file defines multiple ViewModel classes for an Android shopping app, managing UI-related data and operations such as loading products, handling search, cart operations, orders, product details, and user authentication. It also includes factory helpers for ViewModel creation.

classes.name: HomeViewModel
classes.description: Manages loading and displaying a list of deals and products.

classes.name: SearchViewModel
classes.description: Handles product search queries and displays results.

classes.name: CartViewModel
classes.description: Exposes cart operations such as add, remove, clear, and total amount calculation.

classes.name: ProductDetailViewModel
classes.description: Loads product details and adds products to the cart.

classes.name: AuthViewModel
classes.description: Manages authentication flows including login, signup, and logout.

classes.name: VMFactory
classes.description: Generic factory class for creating ViewModels with dependencies.

classes.name: VMProviders
classes.description: Provides factory functions for various ViewModels.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a product to cart in CartViewModel.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a product from cart in CartViewModel.

methods.name: totalAmount
methods.description: Calculates total cart amount in CartViewModel.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Adds current product detail to cart.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates ViewModel instance via creator lambda in VMFactory.
